name: Vegetarian Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta. Mix tomatoes and olive oil. Toss with pasta.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Stir-fry chicken and vegetables. Add soy sauce. Serve hot.

name: Veggie Pizza
instructions: Spread pizza dough. Add toppings. Bake until cheese melts.

name: Salmon Salad
instructions: Grill salmon. Toss with lettuce, cucumber, and dressing.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Cook vegetables in curry sauce. Serve with rice.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook ground beef. Add tomato sauce. Serve over spaghetti.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer tomatoes and mozzarella. Garnish with basil. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Saut√© shrimp in garlic and butter. Squeeze lemon on top.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and feta cheese.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, and salsa.
